Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits motor vehicle dealers from advertising lease specials for a limited number of in stock vehicles which meet the advertised vehicle specifications
Summary: Prohibits motor vehicle dealers from advertising lease specials for a limited number of in stock vehicles which meet the advertised vehicle specifications.
LawCode: Add ยง349-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting motor vehicle dealers from advertising lease specials for a limited number of in stock vehicles which meet the advertised vehicle specifications
